Articles.Content:
Before v1.0 hits I decided to make one more monstrosity that probably won't work with the new aero model. I give you: The Starhammer, a multipurpose carrier with a log of hangars. See for yourself:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iT8q_Exo2po?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ZPEBA)

Wanna try it out? Here's the craft file!

[http://www./download/stjhxb9o0xr0h7f/Starhammer.craft](http://www./download/stjhxb9o0xr0h7f/Starhammer.craft)

Enjoy ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
That's.... really nuts.... there are no more words applicable here.
Epic, now i can play EVE

For those trying to download, i found the reddit post.

[https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/31exmq/need_a_hammer_had_to_launch_this_before_ksp/](https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/31exmq/need_a_hammer_had_to_launch_this_before_ksp/)
